description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Brunnhilde | Valkyrie/Carol Danvers, Carol Danvers & Thor
Characters: Carol Danvers, Thor (Marvel), Brunnhilde | Valkyrie (Marvel), Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Avengers Team (MCU)
Additional Tags: carol x valkyrie, I SHIP IT SO MUCH, thor ships is too, lighthearted coz i don’t need infinity war angst to muddle my shipping goggles’ view
Summary:

Carol turned to look at whatever got Thor all edgy and saw the woman whom she recognized as the one to first greet Thor and the rest of the team earlier, with the silky voice and sharp no-nonsense talk, was walking towards them.

summary:
[Maria opens the door]
Talos: Is Vers here?
Maria: Uhh, you know what-
[Carol throws herself through the window]
Fury: -she just...
body:
[Maria opens the door]

Talos: Is Vers here?

Maria: Uhh, you know what-

[Carol throws herself through the window]

Fury: -she just left

Talos: …really?

Fury: Yeah…

[Carol grabs her jacket from through the broken window]

Maria: Sorry

summary: Report: Chinese Movie Goers Don't Think Brie Larson's Captain Marvel is Attractive Enough
title: Report: Chinese Movie Goers Don't Think Brie Larson's Captain Marvel is Attractive Enough
body:
Report: Chinese Movie Goers Don’t Think Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel is Attractive Enough

Chinese movie goers don’t think Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel is attractive enough.

Marvel Studios latest superhero film was criticized by Chinese movie goers based on the character’s looks.

Abacnus News, which is an English language website focused on China, reports a number of Chinese social media users were not happy with the way Larson’s Captain Marvel looks.

They cited one user who wrote,…

View On WordPress

tags: carol is such a jock I love her look at that hand thing
summary: Thor and Carol give off the same ‘dumb ass jock’ vibes, but like in a neutral good way, like they can bench press you and have...
body:
Thor and Carol give off the same ‘dumb ass jock’ vibes, but like in a neutral good way, like they can bench press you and have one brain cell between them, but they also remember everyone’s birthdays and thank bus drivers

beautiful blond idiots. Also, neither of them are straight, thanks for coming for my TED talk

summary: When Carol blasted yon rogg's ass instead of taking the bait I was incredibly proud of marvel. She could have kicked his ass. A...
body: When Carol blasted yon rogg’s ass instead of taking the bait I was incredibly proud of marvel. She could have kicked his ass. A male superhero would have, it would’ve been an amazing, powerful fight scene where he proves himself and wins his honor. They gave Carol the strength to say no, which is amazing. There are subtle male v female personality differences and it’s pretty cool that Carol was more than just Steve with boobs.

reblog.comment: When Carol blasted yon rogg’s ass instead of taking the bait I was incredibly proud of marvel. She could have kicked his ass. A male superhero would have, it would’ve been an amazing, powerful fight scene where he proves himself and wins his honor. They gave Carol the strength to say no, which is amazing. There are subtle male v female personality differences and it’s pretty cool that Carol was more than just Steve with boobs.

trail.content_raw: When Carol blasted yon rogg’s ass instead of taking the bait I was incredibly proud of marvel. She could have kicked his ass. A male superhero would have, it would’ve been an amazing, powerful fight scene where he proves himself and wins his honor. They gave Carol the strength to say no, which is amazing. There are subtle male v female personality differences and it’s pretty cool that Carol was more than just Steve with boobs.
trail.content: When Carol blasted yon rogg’s ass instead of taking the bait I was incredibly proud of marvel. She could have kicked his ass. A male superhero would have, it would’ve been an amazing, powerful fight scene where he proves himself and wins his honor. They gave Carol the strength to say no, which is amazing. There are subtle male v female personality differences and it’s pretty cool that Carol was more than just Steve with boobs.
